definitions.text: (physics) deformation of a physical body under the action of applied forces
difficulty that causes worry or emotional tension; ; - R.J.Samuelson
examples: she endured the stresses and strains of life
he presided over the economy during the period of the greatest stress and danger

definitions.text: a succession of notes forming a distinctive sequence
examples: she was humming an air from Beethoven

definitions.text: (psychology) nervousness resulting from mental stress
examples: his responsibilities were a constant strain
the mental strain of staying alert hour after hour was too much for him

definitions.text: a special variety of domesticated animals within a species
examples: he experimented on a particular breed of white rats
he created a new strain of sheep

definitions.text: (biology) a group of organisms within a species that differ in trivial ways from similar groups
examples: a new strain of microorganisms

definitions.text: injury to a muscle (often caused by overuse); results in swelling and pain
the general meaning or substance of an utterance
examples: although I disagreed with him I could follow the tenor of his argument

definitions.text: an effortful attempt to attain a goal
an intense or violent exertion
the act of singing
examples: with a shout and a song they marched up to the gates

definitions.text: to exert much effort or energy
examples: straining our ears to hear

definitions.text: test the limits of
examples: You are trying my patience!

definitions.text: use to the utmost; exert vigorously or to full capacity
examples: He really extended himself when he climbed Kilimanjaro
Don't strain your mind too much

definitions.text: separate by passing through a sieve or other straining device to separate out coarser elements
examples: sift the flour

definitions.text: cause to be tense and uneasy or nervous or anxious
examples: he got a phone call from his lawyer that tensed him up

definitions.text: become stretched or tense or taut
examples: the bodybuilder's neck muscles tensed;
the rope strained when the weight was attached

definitions.text: remove by passing through a filter
examples: filter out the impurities

definitions.text: rub through a strainer or process in an electric blender
examples: puree the vegetables for the baby

definitions.text: alter the shape of (something) by stress
examples: His body was deformed by leprosy
